message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR. 

The paper presents a framework for integrating prior knowledge into discriminative classifiers, which is a topic related to machine learning (cs.LG) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of WordNet as a source of background knowledge suggests that the paper may also be relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information retrieval (cs.IR). Additionally, the problem of newsgroup categorization may involve image classification (cs.CV) if the newsgroups contain images.
